response.original_title: Mike Portnoy: The Similitude of a Dream Live
response.overview: Mike's Drum Cam from The Neal Morse Bands The Similitude Of A Dream Live performance from Tilburg in 2017.  Digital Download 1080p Hi Definition Video, MPEG-4 (.mp4)  Tracklist:  Intro Long Day Overture The Dream City of Destruction We Have Got to Go Makes No Sense Draw the Line The Slough Back to the City The Ways of a Fool So Far Gone Breath of Angels Slave to Your Mind Shortcut to Salvation The Man in the Iron Cage The Road Called Home Sloth Freedom Song I'm Running The Mask Confrontation The Battle Broken Sky / Long Day (Reprise) Momentum Author of Confusion Agenda
response.title: Mike Portnoy: The Similitude of a Dream Live
